name: Despotik Design
description:
Back of Box - Amstrad CPC (UK/France/Germany) (from Ad Blurbs)

In his gloomy lair, deep beneath the surface of the world, an unscrupulous adventurer, surrounded by is robot henchmen, has pirated programs for the elaboration of living cells, cells which now produce only the most evil of creatures. These beings are the pirate's slaves. The Earth depends on you to destroy the impostors and re-initialize the programs. An exceptional 3-D arcade, adventure and strategy game whose originality, graphic quality and stunning scenario will glue you to your joystick (or keyboard) for many nail-biting nights.
